name: Baraka
headline: Grow Your Wealth With Baraka
description:
ðŸ’¸Hey YC, weâ€™re baraka (S21), an investment app built for people in the Middle East.

ðŸ“± Our product

This is how we do it:
â€¢	6,000+ stocks and ETFs â€“ the freedom to choose the companies and industries that you want to back
â€¢	The power of financial literacy â€“ educational  content, digestible market news and in-depth stock analysis
â€¢	Fractional Shares â€“ the ability to start investing with smaller sums of money
â€¢	Fair pricing â€“ Transparent, low commission pricing model
â€¢	Easy to use â€“ intuitive user journey and interface  

ðŸ•’ What's Next?

The app is available in countries across MENA. Check out our website: getbaraka.com.

Please reach out to give us feedback, discuss product, go-to-market strategy or anything else on founders@getbaraka.com.  

Feras & Kunal

founders.name: Feras Jalbout, Founder
founders.description: Founder and CEO at baraka.  Former asset manager and VC turned builder and addicted angel investor. Passionate about investing, building and empowering others.

founders.name: Kunal Taneja, Founder
founders.description:
Executive business and technology leader with over two decades of multifaceted expertise spanning various industries, renowned for spearheading digital transformation, product management, cybersecurity, and seamless integration of consumer products across cloud and mobile platforms

![baraka startup of the year](https://assets.getbaraka.com/images/landing/new/startup-of-year.svg)![baraka 2023 award](https://assets.getbaraka.com/images/landing/new/baraka-2023-award.svg)
baraka Financial Limited (DIFC) is regulated by the DFSA (license number [F006586](https://www.getbaraka.com/<https:/www.dfsa.ae/public-register/firms/baraka-financial-limited>))
# Trust and security, guaranteed
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2734%27%20height=%2734%27/%3e)![Investment Protection](https://www.getbaraka.com/)
### Investment Protection
Your investments are protected by the [SIPC](https://www.getbaraka.com/</glossary/sipc>), with a limit of up to $500,000, which includes a $250,000 limit for cash deposits.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2734%27%20height=%2734%27/%3e)![Regulated](https://www.getbaraka.com/)
### Regulated
baraka is regulated by the [DFSA](https://www.getbaraka.com/</glossary/dfsa>) and our partnered broker, [DriveWealth](https://www.getbaraka.com/<https:/www.drivewealth.com/company/about-drivewealth/>), is a [SEC](https://www.getbaraka.com/</glossary/sec>) registered broker dealer and member of [FINRA](https://www.getbaraka.com/</glossary/finra>) and [SIPC](https://www.getbaraka.com/</glossary/sipc>).
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2734%27%20height=%2734%27/%3e)![Data Protection](https://www.getbaraka.com/)
### Data Protection
Our data privacy controls help keep your personal information safe from the moment you sign up. We protect your account from any unauthorized activity using a Multi-factor authentication process.
![bg](https://www.getbaraka.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.getbaraka.com%2Fimages%2Flanding%2Ffeatures-bg.png&w=3840&q=80)
# The Ultimate Investor Toolkit
#### Discover everything our app has to offer.
### ![arrow](https://www.getbaraka.com/)Income Center
A better way to track all of your earned income from Dividends on Stocks, REITs and Bond ETFs. [Learn more](https://www.getbaraka.com/</features/income-center>)
### ![arrow](https://www.getbaraka.com/)Stock Analysis & Reports
Access detailed stock analysis and reports from [LSEG](https://www.getbaraka.com/<https:/www.refinitiv.com/>) with analyst estimates on share price movements. [Learn more](https://www.getbaraka.com/</features/stock-analysis>)
### ![arrow](https://www.getbaraka.com/)Auto-Invest
Eliminate the hassle of deposits and attempting to time your investments. [Learn more](https://www.getbaraka.com/</features/auto-investment>)
### ![arrow](https://www.getbaraka.com/)Sharia Screener
Invest without compromising your personal beliefs. [Learn more](https://www.getbaraka.com/</features/sharia-screener>)
### ![arrow](https://www.getbaraka.com/)DRIP
Dividend Reinvestment Plan (DRIP) allows you to reinvest your cash dividends into additional shares or fractional shares. [Learn more](https://www.getbaraka.com/</features/dividend-reinvestment-plan>)
### ![arrow](https://www.getbaraka.com/)Investor Calendar
Easily monitor relevant information and updates for the stocks and funds in your portfolio or watchlists. [Learn more](https://www.getbaraka.com/</features/investor-calendar>)
![Income Center](https://www.getbaraka.com/)![Stock Analysis & Reports](https://www.getbaraka.com/)![Auto-Invest](https://www.getbaraka.com/)![Sharia Screener](https://www.getbaraka.com/)![DRIP](https://www.getbaraka.com/)![Investor Calendar](https://www.getbaraka.com/)
# FAQs
#### Explore frequently asked questions by baraka community members.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2724%27%20height=%2724%27/%3e)![Arrow](https://www.getbaraka.com/)
### What is baraka?
#### baraka is an investment platform that enables GCC investors to make informed and strategic long-term investment decisions, by allowing them to to easily invest in thousands of U.S. stocks and ETFs. From our comprehensive suite of products and cutting-edge automation tools to the expert insights and resources we provide, we are committed to supporting users in building and managing their wealth in a way that aligns with their financial goals and values.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2724%27%20height=%2724%27/%3e)![Arrow](https://www.getbaraka.com/)
### Is the baraka app free to use?
#### Yes, the baraka app is free to use on our standard plan. With baraka, you can expect fair pricing, complete transparency, and no hidden fees. You have access to 6,000+ U.S. stocks, and exchange traded funds (ETFs). We do offer a premium paid subscription that provides additional stock analysis from our world-class equity research partner, Refinitiv.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2724%27%20height=%2724%27/%3e)![Arrow](https://www.getbaraka.com/)
### Which broker does baraka work with and how are my deposits and investments secured?
#### We have partnered with DriveWealth, a SEC registered broker dealer and member of FINRA and SIPC. Your investments are protected by the Securities Investor Protection Corporation (SIPC) up to $500,000 (or $250,000 on cash deposits). More information can be found [here](https://www.getbaraka.com/<https:/www.sipc.org/>).
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2724%27%20height=%2724%27/%3e)![Arrow](https://www.getbaraka.com/)
### How can I fund my baraka account
Easily fund your account through **Google/Apple Pay** , instantly with a **bank deposit** , by **connecting your bank account** , or by **Wire transfer**. 
[Read more on our FAQ page.](https://www.getbaraka.com/</faq/how-can-i-fund-my-baraka-account>)
[View all FAQs](https://www.getbaraka.com/</support>)
![bg](https://www.getbaraka.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.getbaraka.com%2Fimages%2Flanding%2Fchoose-bg.jpg&w=3840&q=80)
# Choose Your Plan
#### Investment success starts with making the right choices.
[Compare Plans](https://www.getbaraka.com/</plans>)
[![Pricing plan](https://www.getbaraka.com/)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2725%27%20height=%2725%27/%3e)![diamond](https://www.getbaraka.com/)Best for YouStandardFreeIt is the ideal choice for those who want to get more out of their finances.](https://www.getbaraka.com/</plans#compare>)
[![Pricing plan](https://www.getbaraka.com/)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2725%27%20height=%2725%27/%3e)![diamond](https://www.getbaraka.com/)Best for YouPremiumFree for 30 days, then $9.99/monthUnlock your finances' potential with tools like Auto-Invest, Price Alerts, Investor Calendar and many more. Grow your wealth with Premium and watch it flourish.](https://www.getbaraka.com/</plans#compare>)
[![Pricing plan](https://www.getbaraka.com/)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2725%27%20height=%2725%27/%3e)![diamond](https://www.getbaraka.com/)Best for YouPremium+$20 Month / $199.95/yearUnlock the maximum number of free trades and withdrawals, the lowest deposit fees, and more.](https://www.getbaraka.com/</plans#compare>)
# Uncertain About Your Choice?
#### Begin with the complimentary Standard Plan.
Get the App
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27140%27%20height=%2740%27/%3e)![baraka logo](https://assets.getbaraka.com/images/common/baraka-logo-black-en.svg)

Baraka Financial Limited ("Baraka") is registered in the Dubai International Financial Centre ("DIFC") and is regulated by the Dubai Financial Services Authority ("DFSA"). It holds a Category 3C license with a Retail Client and a Holding and Controlling Client Assets endorsement. Baraka is a wholly owned subsidiary of Baraka Technology Holding in Abu Dhabi Global Market.
Baraka shall not be responsible for any loss arising from any investment based on any general information provided by Baraka or as may be available on Barakaâ€™s website and other web-based services (collectively, the "Website Services"). Your investment can fluctuate, so you may get back less than you invested. Baraka does not warrant that the information is accurate, reliable or complete or that the supply will be without interruptions. Any third party information provided through does not reflect the views of Baraka.. 
The content of the Website Services provided by Baraka is only intended to provide you with general information and is neither an offer to sell nor a solicitation of an offer to purchase any security and may not be relied upon for investment purposes. Any commentaries, articles, daily news items, public and/or private chat publications, stock analysis and/or other information contained in the Website Services should not be considered investment advice.
Baraka shall not be liable for any delay, inaccuracy, error or omission of any kind in the information provided by Baraka and/or any third party information provider or for any resulting loss or damage you may suffer as a result of or in connection with the information supplied by Baraka and/or any third party information provider. In addition, Baraka shall have no liability for any losses arising from unauthorized access to information or any other misuse of information.
Any opinions, news, research, analysis, prices, or other information contained on our Website Services, or emailed to you, are provided as general market commentary, and do not constitute investment advice. Baraka will not accept liability for any loss or damage, including, without limitation, for any loss of profit which may arise directly or indirectly from use of or reliance on such information. Each decision as to whether an investment is appropriate or proper is an independent decision by you. You agree that Baraka has no fiduciary duty to you and is not responsible for any liabilities, claims, damages, costs and expenses, including attorneysâ€™ fees, incurred in connection with you following Barakaâ€™s generic investment information.
Baraka provides traditional securities and does not intend to engage a Shariah advisor or obtain a fatwa regarding Shariah screened securities. Baraka does not have an Islamic Window endorsement from the DFSA. Clients should be aware that Shariah screened stocks may involve additional risks and costs. There can be no assurance as to the Shariah compliance of the securities listed by Baraka. Clients are reminded that views on Shariah compliance differ and that they should obtain their own independent advice as to the permissibility of a security.
We use our own cookies as well as third-party cookies on our websites to enhance your experience, analyze our traffic, and for security and marketing. For more info, see our [Cookie Policy.](https://www.getbaraka.com/</privacy-policy/#cookie>)

# Trust and security, guaranteed
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2734%27%20height=%2734%27/%3e)![Investment ProtectionâŸ¨24âŸ©]
### Investment Protection
Your investments are protected by the SIPCâŸ¨37âŸ©, with a limit of up to $500,000, which includes a $250,000 limit for cash deposits.

baraka is regulated by the DFSAâŸ¨38âŸ© and our partnered broker, DriveWealthâŸ¨39âŸ©, is a SECâŸ¨40âŸ© registered broker dealer and member of FINRAâŸ¨41âŸ© and SIPCâŸ¨37âŸ©.

### Data Protection
Our data privacy controls help keep your personal information safe from the moment you sign up. We protect your account from any unauthorized activity using a Multi-factor authentication process.

# FAQs

### What is baraka?
#### baraka is an investment platform that enables GCC investors to make informed and strategic long-term investment decisions, by allowing them to to easily invest in thousands of U.S. stocks and ETFs. From our comprehensive suite of products and cutting-edge automation tools to the expert insights and resources we provide, we are committed to supporting users in building and managing their wealth in a way that aligns with their financial goals and values.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2724%27%20height=%2724%27/%3e)![ArrowâŸ¨24âŸ©]
### Is the baraka app free to use?
#### Yes, the baraka app is free to use on our standard plan. With baraka, you can expect fair pricing, complete transparency, and no hidden fees. You have access to 6,000+ U.S. stocks, and exchange traded funds (ETFs). We do offer a premium paid subscription that provides additional stock analysis from our world-class equity research partner, Refinitiv.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2724%27%20height=%2724%27/%3e)![ArrowâŸ¨24âŸ©]
### Which broker does baraka work with and how are my deposits and investments secured?

### How can I fund my baraka account
Easily fund your account through **Google/Apple Pay** , instantly with a **bank deposit** , by **connecting your bank account** , or by **Wire transfer**.

Baraka Financial Limited ("Baraka") is registered in the Dubai International Financial Centre ("DIFC") and is regulated by the Dubai Financial Services Authority ("DFSA"). Your investment can fluctuate, so you may get back less than you invested. Any third party information provided through does not reflect the views of Baraka.. 
The content of the Website Services provided by Baraka is only intended to provide you with general information and is neither an offer to sell nor a solicitation of an offer to purchase any security and may not be relied upon for investment purposes. Any commentaries, articles, daily news items, public and/or private chat publications, stock analysis and/or other information contained in the Website Services should not be considered investment advice.
Baraka shall not be liable for any delay, inaccuracy, error or omission of any kind in the information provided by Baraka and/or any third party information provider or for any resulting loss or damage you may suffer as a result of or in connection with the information supplied by Baraka and/or any third party information provider. In addition, Baraka shall have no liability for any losses arising from unauthorized access to information or any other misuse of information.
Any opinions, news, research, analysis, prices, or other information contained on our Website Services, or emailed to you, are provided as general market commentary, and do not constitute investment advice. Baraka will not accept liability for any loss or damage, including, without limitation, for any loss of profit which may arise directly or indirectly from use of or reliance on such information. Each decision as to whether an investment is appropriate or proper is an independent decision by you. You agree that Baraka has no fiduciary duty to you and is not responsible for any liabilities, claims, damages, costs and expenses, including attorneysâ€™ fees, incurred in connection with you following Barakaâ€™s generic investment information.
Baraka provides traditional securities and does not intend to engage a Shariah advisor or obtain a fatwa regarding Shariah screened securities. Baraka does not have an Islamic Window endorsement from the DFSA. Clients should be aware that Shariah screened stocks may involve additional risks and costs. There can be no assurance as to the Shariah compliance of the securities listed by Baraka. Clients are reminded that views on Shariah compliance differ and that they should obtain their own independent advice as to the permissibility of a security.

generated_description:
Baraka is a groundbreaking investment app specifically designed for users in the Middle East, particularly focusing on the GCC region. Founded in 2020 and part of the Y Combinator S21 batch, Baraka aims to make investing accessible and straightforward for everyone. Their mission is simple: "Grow Your Wealth With Baraka."

### What They Offer

Barakaâ€™s platform provides access to over **6,000 stocks and ETFs**, giving users the freedom to choose investments that resonate with themâ€”whether that's a tech giant or an emerging industry. But itâ€™s not just about choice; Baraka emphasizes **financial literacy**, offering educational content and detailed market analysis to empower investors to make informed decisions.

A standout feature is **fractional shares**, allowing users to start investing with as little money as they wantâ€”perfect for those just dipping their toes into the investment world. Their transparent pricing model means there are no nasty surprisesâ€”just low commission fees. The app is user-friendly, designed with an intuitive interface to make each step of investing a breeze.

### Whatâ€™s Next?

Baraka is already available across multiple MENA countries, and they continue to expand their services. The company has a dynamic team of **34 employees** and is based in the **United Arab Emirates**. They proudly received recognition as a **Future 100 company** from the UAE Ministry of Economy, which showcases their potential in the fintech space.

### Features

Some noteworthy features include:
- **Income Center**: Track dividends from your investments.
- **Stock Analysis & Reports**: Get insights backed by expert market analysis.
- **Auto-Invest**: Automate your investments without the hassle.
- **Sharia Screener**: Invest in accordance with your personal beliefs.
- **Dividend Reinvestment Plan**: Reinvent your dividends into further investments.

### Security & Regulation

Baraka operates under the regulatory oversight of the **Dubai Financial Services Authority (DFSA)**, ensuring that your investments are secure. They partner with **DriveWealth**, a registered broker dealer, to offer additional layers of protection, including SIPC insurance of up to $500,000.
